name: Scott Mckee Jr

text: I had ordered a small pizza online. My order was to be ready in 20 minutes. Upon arriving my order wasn‚Äôt ready. I believe my order had not been reviewed. I dealt with Trevor and Justen. They were extremely busy with only the 2 of them ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Allen
text: I ordered a pizza in Wednesday, April 1st.  I ordered a large pepperoni, onion, and green pepper pizza and Howie wings with garlic sauce.  This pizza was the best I have had from all of the other chains.    I ordered it with extra sauce. ‚Ä¶More

text: They make a Mean chese pizza maaaaan! Far out

name: Carrie Orlando
text: I have never wrote a review until now! I gave this place three chances and all 3 times they forgot my flavored crust! Service is terrible and they always forget the dipping sauces too! Never again!

name: Paul Hopson
text: Terrible service worst hungry Howie's I have ever been to stood there for 5 mins before anyone said anything to me. Tracker said my food was done for 15 mins still waiting for my food. Pizza and sub sit in the hot box for 15 mins while I ‚Ä¶More

name: Bill Scharfenberg
text: The pizza is pretty good!  The key is extra sauce on your orders.  Otherwise, it runs a little light when regular is selected.  Delivery and carry out are both fast.  The prices can be a little high at times for basic pizza, but their ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiger9194 Productions
text: Food is always fresh and ready. Staff/Delivery drivers are very friendly.

name: Melanie Smith
text: Waited 20 minutes outside of building after 11 and the door was still locked. We called to try to get someone to open the door and they put us on hold... will not ever waste time coming to this location again.

name: Caitlin A.
text: I don't know what happened, but the pizza I just had was the best I ever had from Hungry Howies. Keep up the great work!

name: hungry howie
text: very good pizza and a very nice young man working inside, he sometimes has a beard sometimes he doesn't. Either way he provides excellence customer service. If i could could rate it a 10 i would. Highly recommend

name: Truthful Reviewer
text: Truly embarrassing, I ordered a 2 for 5.99 and the pizza came out ok but the ‚Äúboneless chicken wings‚Äù looked like cheap tyson nuggets, squirted with bbq sauce. I mean I could have made better at home cheaper without trying. Its sad, you ‚Ä¶More

text: Got my order wrong twice and the pizza still didnt taste that great. " responce to owner" and what exactly are you going to do to improve this. I wasted my money once here and you took 2 months for a company response. As far as PR goes its kinda sad

name: OloSnowLeo
text: Quick and easy pick up!

name: Brian Hadfield
text: It's fine. Just not my favorite pizza. I feel like I need to eat a whole pie to feel filled. It's what you'd expect. Good crust flavors.

name: Emily knight
text: My food is always hot, great, and always received in a timely manner. This location is great and super friendly. My kids are enjoying their hungry Howie‚Äôs  dinner as I write this and they are loving it.  Keep up the good work hungry howies.

text: Always cooked to perfection, delivery and pickup both are very fast options. Service here is very good and all employees I have encountered are very courteous and kind. ‚Ä¶More

text: Ninety-nine percent of the time their pizzas are awesome got to love hungry Howie's

text: People are so rude here and very argumentative. I will never order from this place again! Plus there are much better pizzas than them!

text: Love this one as people are great there

name: Still Crazy
text: walked in. lady on phone... looked up and smiled. great to be acknowledged upon entering. young guy helped me. suggested i try garlic with my cajun crust.  giving it a shot. great service.  getting harder and harder to find. keep up the great work!

name: Aaron Fritz
text: Funny staff..always super friendly when I pick up my order..food is always fast and hot

name: Jane King
text: Had a driver tailgate me, watched him in my rear view display some very aggressive hand gestures.  Speed limit in my sub is 15!  This may be private property but as speeding through here has become such a problem police are now ticketing ‚Ä¶More

text: We are generally happy with their pizza, but the quality can fluctuate as it did this time. We also tried their bbq chicken pizza on thin crust. Not impressed at all.

name: Bradley Leyten
text: Let's face it... you can get a pizza on any corner. I go here because not only is the food prepared well but they're prompt and the staff is always provided service with a smile and a pleasant attitude. Keep up the good work!

name: Nicole Gillison
text: Order from this location quiet often, never had a bad pizza. Tonights pizza was amazing!!

name: Wayne Ford
text: It's good for a quick pizza ,not as friendly as poppa John's or Sorrento's, prices are reasonable, delivery takes about an hour,not a place to dine in

text: Ordered from here almost every Sunday for about a year. Always consistent food quality. Never messed up an order!

name: Chad Nelson
text: This location always has prompt pickup and has consistently gotten our order right.  Gotta love a good Hungry Howie's aroung the corner from home.

name: Ryan Wagner
text: Just moved back to this area. Tried placing an order over the phone. Was asked to repeat myself three times. There was a very loud humming noise in the background and the employee was having a hard time hearing me. We placed an order with the location on Hayes instead.

name: Ashley Hengy
text: This is the second time I have ordered from them and both times my BBQ sauce was barely drizzled on the boneless wings. Never again. I will be contacting corporate.
